DOC.detailed_description: This open-label , randomize , single dose , cross-over study healthy subject . Each subject receive tobramycin 3 different inhalation device : - 75 mg tobramycin deliver airway via TobrAir® 6.0 . - 300 mg tobramycin ( TOBI® ) deliver airway via PARI LC® PLUS/PARI TurboBoy® SX . - 112 mg tobramycin ( 4x28mg dry powder capsule ) deliver airway via TOBI® Podhaler™ . Each dose separate minimum washout least 68 h. Blood sample PK analysis tobramycin collect regular time interval 24 h post-dose . For TobrAir 6.0 TOBI/PARI , dose subject undergo scintigraphic assessment .
